def process_list(lst):
    atom_int = int(''.join(lst))
    sum_digits = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(atom_int)))
    return atom_int / sum_digits

def process_list(lst):
    atom_int = int('MUTATED'.join(lst))
    sum_digits = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(atom_int)))
